amendment.description: Amendment allows the National Institute of Standards and Technology to perform activities in environmental technologies, health care, construction technology and information infrastructure.
amendment.purpose: An amendment not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to allow NIST measurement standardization activities in environmental technologies, health care, construction and information infrastructure.

action.text: Tanner amendment (A031) modified by unanimous consent. A modification to reflect that the changes made relate to "standards related" research.
On agreeing to the Tanner amendment (A031) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
